title: Perspective : An Essential Guide Featuring Basic Principles, Advanced Techniques, and Practical Applications
author: William F. Powell
description: Whether you specialize in drawing - even cartooning and animation - or prefer media such as acrylic, oil, pastel, or watercolor, a good knowledge of perspective is invaluable. It is the foundation of all great paintings and drawings, no matter what medium. Perspective shows you everything you need to know to make objects look three dimensional.
